Project_Title: The Enterotoxigenic Bacteroides fragilis (ETBF) in intestinal inflammation and colorectal carcinogenesis [exosomes] (human)
Project_Description:
To elucidate whether  Enterotoxigenic Bacteroides fragilis (ETBF) plays a role in  intestinal inflammation and colorectal carcinogenesis, a RNA-seq analysis was performed to compare the microRNA profiles of  exosomes derived from ETBF-treated HCT116 colorectal cancer cell lines.
Overall design: miRNA-seq was performed in exosomes derived from HCT116 colorectal cancer cells after ETBF treatment.
